languages.text: Планета Райкад Минорис гибнет под напором сил Архиврага. Несмотря на все усилия Лорд-капитана, предсказание еретиков о Последнем восходе все же сбылось. Тем, кто не желает быть пожранными губительными силами Архиврага, остается лишь бежать с планеты.

Rykad Minoris is falling to the relentless assault of the Archenemy's forces. Despite the Lord Captain's best efforts, the heretical prophecy of the Final Dawn has come to pass. Those who do not want to be devoured by the Ruinous Powers must flee the planet.
languages.original_text: Планета Райкад Минорис гибнет под напором сил Архиврага. Несмотря на все усилия Лорд-капитана, предсказание еретиков о Последнем восходе все же сбылось. Тем, кто не желает быть пожранными губительными силами Архиврага, остается лишь бежать с планеты.

traits.locale_text: Rykad Minoris is falling to the relentless assault of the Archenemy's forces. Despite Lord Captain's best efforts, the heretical prophecy of the Final Dawn has come to pass. Those who don't want to be devoured by the Ruinous Powers must flee the planet.

Rykad Minoris is falling to the relentless assault of the Archenemy's forces. Despite the Lord Captain's best efforts, the heretical prophecy of the Final Dawn has come to pass. Those who do not want to be devoured by the Ruinous Powers must flee the planet.

Rykad Minoris is falling to the relentless assault of the Archenemy's forces. Despite the Lord Captain's best efforts, the heretical prophecy of the Final Dawn has come to pass. Those who do not want to be devoured by the Ruinous Powers must flee the planet.

languages.text: Rykad Minoris kann dem Sturmangriff der Einsatzkräfte des Erzfeinds nicht standhalten. Trotz aller Bemühungen des Lord Captain hat die ketzerische Prophezeiung der Letzten Dämmerung sich bewahrheitet. Wer von den Mächten der Zerstörung nicht verschlungen werden will, muss von dem Planeten fliehen.
languages.original_text: Rykad Minoris is falling to the relentless assault of the Archenemy's forces. Despite the Lord Captain's best efforts, the heretical prophecy of the Final Dawn has come to pass. Those who do not want to be devoured by the Ruinous Powers must flee the planet.

traits.locale_text: Rykad Minoris kann dem Sturmangriff der Einsatzkräfte des Erzfeinds nicht standhalten. Trotz aller Bemühungen des Lord Captain hat die ketzerische Prophezeiung der Letzten Dämmerung sich bewahrheitet. Wer von den Mächten der Zerstörung nicht verschlungen werden will, muss von dem Planeten fliehen.

languages.text: Rykad Minoris succombe à l'assaut implacable des forces du Grand Ennemi. En dépit de tous les efforts {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}, la prophétie hérétique de l'Aube finale est devenue réalité. Quiconque ne souhaite pas voir les Puissances de la Ruine le dévorer doit quitter la planète.
languages.original_text: Rykad Minoris is falling to the relentless assault of the Archenemy's forces. Despite the Lord Captain's best efforts, the heretical prophecy of the Final Dawn has come to pass. Those who do not want to be devoured by the Ruinous Powers must flee the planet.

traits.locale_text: Rykad Minoris succombe à l'assaut implacable des forces du Grand Ennemi. En dépit de tous les efforts {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}, la prophétie hérétique de l'Aube finale est devenue réalité. Quiconque ne souhaite pas voir les Puissances de la Ruine le dévorer doit quitter la planète.

languages.text: ライカド・ミノリスは、渾沌の勢力の容赦ない攻撃によって陥落しつつある。ロード・キャプテンの多大な尽力にもかかわらず、最後の夜明けという異端の予言が現実のものとなった。禍つ神々に食い尽くされたくない者は、この惑星から逃げ出さなければならない。
languages.original_text: Rykad Minoris is falling to the relentless assault of the Archenemy's forces. Despite the Lord Captain's best efforts, the heretical prophecy of the Final Dawn has come to pass. Those who do not want to be devoured by the Ruinous Powers must flee the planet.

traits.locale_text: ライカド・ミノリスは、渾沌の勢力の容赦ない攻撃によって陥落しつつある。ロード・キャプテンの多大な尽力にもかかわらず、最後の夜明けという異端の予言が現実のものとなった。禍つ神々に食い尽くされたくない者は、この惑星から逃げ出さなければならない。

languages.text: Rykad Minoris está cayendo frente al inexorable asalto de las fuerzas del Archienemigo. A pesar de los esfuerzos de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán, la profecía hereje del Amanecer Final se ha cumplido. Quienes no quieran ser devorados por los Poderes Ruinosos deben escapar del planeta.
languages.original_text: Rykad Minoris is falling to the relentless assault of the Archenemy's forces. Despite the Lord Captain's best efforts, the heretical prophecy of the Final Dawn has come to pass. Those who do not want to be devoured by the Ruinous Powers must flee the planet.

traits.locale_text: Rykad Minoris está cayendo frente al inexorable asalto de las fuerzas del Archienemigo. A pesar de los esfuerzos de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán, la profecía hereje del Amanecer Final se ha cumplido. Quienes no quieran ser devorados por los Poderes Ruinosos deben escapar del planeta.

languages.text: 小莱卡德在混沌大敌无情的攻势下灭亡了。尽管领主舰长做了最大的努力，但终末黎明的异端预言还是实现了。如果不想被毁灭之力吞噬，就必须立刻逃离这颗行星。
languages.original_text: Rykad Minoris is falling to the relentless assault of the Archenemy's forces. Despite the Lord Captain's best efforts, the heretical prophecy of the Final Dawn has come to pass. Those who do not want to be devoured by the Ruinous Powers must flee the planet.

traits.locale_text: 小莱卡德在混沌大敌无情的攻势下灭亡了。尽管领主舰长做了最大的努力，但终末黎明的异端预言还是实现了。如果不想被毁灭之力吞噬，就必须立刻逃离这颗行星。

languages.text: Rykad Minoris, Şerbaşı'nın kuvvetlerinin amansız saldırısına yenik düşüyor. Lord Kaptan'ın tüm çabalarına rağmen Nihai Şafak'ın kâfirce kehaneti gerçekleşti. Yıkıcı Güçler'in pençesine düşmek istemeyen herkes gezegeni derhâl terk etmeli.
languages.original_text: Rykad Minoris is falling to the relentless assault of the Archenemy's forces. Despite the Lord Captain's best efforts, the heretical prophecy of the Final Dawn has come to pass. Those who do not want to be devoured by the Ruinous Powers must flee the planet.

traits.locale_text: Rykad Minoris, Şerbaşı'nın kuvvetlerinin amansız saldırısına yenik düşüyor. Lord Kaptan'ın tüm çabalarına rağmen Nihai Şafak'ın kâfirce kehaneti gerçekleşti. Yıkıcı Güçler'in pençesine düşmek istemeyen herkes gezegeni derhâl terk etmeli.
